articles.title: Changes in sex hormones during menopause increases risk of cardiovascular problems - The European Scientist
articles.description: Changes in sex hormones during menopause lead to increases in bad cholesterol levels, according to a study published in the European Journal of Preventive Cardiology, a publication from the European Society of Cardiology.

articles.title: HSE official says meal deals should 'be illegal' in Ireland - Cork Beo
